name: Match Maker (SlushyAnimals)
description:
fill the role of faerie godmother as you transform your ward into the perfect bride for her prince charming! beware your rival, the evil stepmother, and her plot to take over the kingdom with her own royal candidate...

hey everyone! this is a short little project for a contest over on Tfgamessite.com!

the theme of the contest was "competition", and i used it as an opportunity to experiment with "paper doll" style assets! 

the game is centered around transformations. it features BE and anthro species changes prominently. 

I don't really intend to update this one, but if there is enough interest, I might be persuaded to hire an actual writer and add some more artwork!
